short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to randomly check ignored bookmarks during your leisure time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension displays random bookmarks that the user hasn't visited in the past 7 days when opening a new tab. It helps users rediscover and re-engage with their neglected bookmarks.
